FLOYD2.CAR_HIJACK_POST_ANGRY.001.A.DE: Du bist so was von erledigt!

FLOYD2.CAR_HIJACK_POST_ANGRY.001.C.DE: Wenn ich dich finde, bring ich dich um!
FLOYD2.CAR_HIJACK_POST_ANGRY.001.C.EN: I'm gonna kill you if I ever find you!
FLOYD2.CAR_HIJACK_POST_ANGRY.001.C.FR: Si je te retrouve, je te bute !
FLOYD2.CAR_HIJACK_POST_ANGRY.001.C.IT: Se ti trovo, ti ammazzo con le mie mani!
FLOYD2.CAR_HIJACK_POST_ANGRY.001.C.RU: Если я тебя найду, я тебя прикончу!

FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.B.DE: Ich schneid dich in Scheiben, pok gai.
FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.B.EN: I am gonna break you in pieces, pok gai.
FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.B.FR: Je vais te briser en morceaux, tête de nœud.
FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.B.IT: Ti faccio in mille pezzi, stronzo.
FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.B.SP: Te voy a hacer picadillo, cabronazo.

FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.C.DE: Das ist das Ende des Weges ...
FLOYD2.COMBAT_PRE_POSTURE.001.C.EN: It's the end of the road...
